basics.name: Hyunseok Choi
basics.label: AI Developer
basics.summary: AI engineer to develop Generative AI models, enabling users to be more productive and accessible.

education.area: Department of Electrical and Electronic Engineering
Department of Human Environment and Design, the Cognitive Science, and the Applied Statistics

publications.name: Moving object tracking based on sparse optical flow with moving window and target estimator
publications.summary: The suggested approach was applied to real environments including various illumination (indoor and outdoor) conditions, a number of moving objects and obstacles, and the performance was evaluated on an embedded board (Raspberry pi4).

publications.name: Efficient Data Selection with YOLOv5 Deep Learning Model
publications.summary: The data selection method can be a useful tool for deep learning on a large amount of datasets.

projects.name: Moving Object Recognition Software on SVM Camera
projects.summary: Development of software for identifying specific objects (vehicles, motorcycles, pedestrians) within the SVM-synthesized video region for buses.

projects.name: Moving Object Detection Algorithm on Surveillance Camera
projects.summary: Development of algorithm for recognizing moving objects in surveillance camera systems through analysis and application of bio-sensing systems.
highlights: Optimized algorithm based on sparse optical flow

projects.name: Gesture Recognition Algorithm on TOF Camera
projects.summary: Development of a facial gesture recognition algorithm utilizing distance information captured by a Time-of-Flight (TOF) camera.
highlights: Rule-based algorithm based on dense optical flow

projects.name: Obstacle Detection Algorithm on TOF Camera
projects.summary: Development of an obstacle detection algorithm for door operation using a TOF camera mounted on the vehicle's side door.

projects.name: Swarm Intelligence System Simulation
projects.summary: Study on collective behavior strategies for efficient problem-solving.
highlights: â€‹Simulation and research of multi agent system based on swarm robotics

awards.title: Best oral award
awards.awarder: The International Council on Electrical Engineering Conference 2022 (ICEE 2022)
